Title:
So happy to read #fertility in #multiplesclerosis is discussed at #ECTRIMS2022 

The evidence we had were very bad, but now we know that better communication among neurologists + repro docs AND the continuation of DMTs right to IVF are keys! No increased risk of relapse!
Author: maclaudiaa
Full Text: so happy to read #fertility in #multiplesclerosis is discussed at #ectrims2022 the evidence we had were very bad, but now we know that better communication among neurologists + repro docs and the continuation of dmts right to ivf are keys! no increased risk of relapse!
